headline: Happy Grandparent's Day! They - and We - Deserve an Expanded Social Security
authors: Nancy Altman, ContributorFounding Co-director, Social Security Works
short_description: After 80 years, Social Security has stood the test of time.  It is incredibly efficient, spending less than a penny of every dollar on administration -- the remaining 99 cents is paid in benefits.  The question isn't can we afford to expand Social Security.  As the wealthiest nation in the world, at the wealthiest moment in our history, there is no question that we can afford to expand Social Security.  The real question is how can we afford not to do so.
